

.. _sphx_glr_sphinx_gallery_examples_02seismo:

SeismoGM
--------------------

:class:`gmspy.SeismoGM` is a class for computing various intensity measures (IMs) of ground motions,
as well as elastic response spectra, constant ductility response spectra, and spectrum-related IMs.


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Elastic response spectra">
